Summary: 2 INDEPENDANT SET OF BLINKING FLASHING LIGHTS (POLICE COLOURS) MOVING UNLIKE A PLANE/JET OR HELICOPTER/ OR SATELITE
divs: Sighting DetailsfIRST OBSERVED TWO FLASHING LIGHTS MOVING IN A VERY STRANGE WAY ALMOST DANCING AT TIMES THEY WOULD GET REALLY INTENSE. THEY WOULD CHANGE DIRECTION VERY REPIDLY MOVING UP AND DOWN IN VAROUS WAY ACROSS THE HORIZON. tHEN VIEWD THROUGH BINOCULARS BOTH LIGHTS WERE INDEPENDENT ALMOST LOOKED AS IF IT WAS TWO JETS PRACTISING DOG FIGHTS LIKE BARREL ROLLS AND SUCH BUT AT SUCH INCREDABLE SPEED AND ANGLES...THEY WOULD CHANGE THEIR FLIGHT PATTERN VERY ABRUPTLY. THEY REMAINED IN THE SAME PATCH OF SKY FOR CLOSE TO THREE HRS AT LEAST. i WOKE MY WIFE TO WITNESS THEM AS WELL AND SHE GOT FREAKED OUT AS WELL.
